settings.title:
NOTHING TO HIDE HERE
BROWSE OUR INGREDIENT INDEX
settings.description:
Each ingredient in Wellnesse personal care products is carefully-selected, sustainably-sourced, clean, and high quality. 

Because we believe in being 100% transparent, we provide you with the EWG (Environmental Working Group) rating for each ingredient. No need to open another tab, unless you want to, of course ;)

settings.title: Activated Charcoal Powder
settings.function: Pulls toxins from mouth, removes stains
settings.description: Charcoal from virgin coconut shell

settings.title: Acyl Coenzyme A Desaturase
settings.description: Fatty Acid that makes up our active blend

settings.title: Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract
settings.function:
Softens and soothes the skin, adds a pleasant scent.

Eliminates disease-causing bacteria, whitens teeth, reduces staining
settings.description: The juice pressed from the aloe vera succulent

settings.title: Aqua
settings.function: Builds the base of our formula
settings.description: It's fresh water!

settings.title: Argania Spinosa (Argan) Kernel Oil
settings.function: Conditions hair, remoisturizes scalp, boosts shine
settings.description: A plant oil produced from the kernels of the argan tree

settings.title: Bisabolol
settings.description: Bark from the Candeia Tree

settings.title: Brassica Alcohol
settings.description: A 100% natural conditioning base derived from the cabbage plant. This crucial ingredient replaces BTMS and Cetrominum Chloride, found in most natural and non-natural conditioners.

settings.title: Brassicyl Valinate Esylate
settings.description: A natural emulsifier derived solely from fermentation and plant materials (rice and sugar cane) using sustainable green chemistry.

settings.title: Bursera Graveolens Wood Oil
settings.description: Wood Extract

settings.title: Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter
settings.function: Softens and soothes the skin. Moisturizes scalp
settings.description: A fat extracted from the nut of the African shea tree

settings.title: Calcium Carbonate
settings.function: Removes plaque, debris and surface stains
settings.description: A calcium derived from limestone and purified

settings.title: Camellia Sinesis (Green Tea) Leaf Extract
settings.description: Green tea leaves that are stoneground and sifted into a fine powder

settings.title: Camellia Sinensis Leaf
settings.description: Tea plant

settings.title: Candelilla Wax
settings.function: Allows floss to slide through teeth
settings.description: Wax derived from the candelilla shrub leaves

settings.title: Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride
settings.function: Helps product spread smoothly on skin
settings.description: Oil derived from pressed coconuts

settings.title: Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Oleosomes
settings.function: Boosts hydration, softness, shine and aids in dry combing
settings.description: A naturally derived emulsifer from Safflower Oil

settings.title: Cereus Grandiflorus (Cactus) Flower Extract
settings.function: Aids in shine and maintains pH balance of scalp
settings.description: Extract of Cactus Flower

settings.title: Water
settings.function: Builds the base of our formula
settings.description: It's Fresh Water!

settings.title: Stevia Rebaudiana Leaf Extract
settings.description: A sweetener and sugar substitute derived from the leaves of Stevia rebaudiana

settings.title: Xanthan Gum
settings.description: A sugar derived from corn

settings.title: Natural Strawberry Flavor
settings.description: A naturally derived flavor that gives our Strawberry Toothpaste its fruity taste!

settings.title: Sodium Cocoyl Glutamate
settings.function: Creates a nice foam, binds oils and waters together
settings.description: A mild vegetable-based surfactant derived from from coconut oil

settings.title: Hydroxyapatite - Micro
settings.description: A naturally occurring mineral that makes up tooth enamel

settings.title: Silica
settings.description: A colorless compound which occurs naturally in sandstone and other rocks.

settings.title: Xylitol
settings.function: Enhances saliva flow and supports healthy pH levels in the mouth
settings.description: Naturally derived from corn cob

settings.title: Sorbitol
settings.function: Adds a pleasant sweet taste and binds ingredients together
settings.description: A carbohydrate that is a sugar based alcohol with one third the calories of traditional sugar

settings.title: Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil
settings.function:
Softens and soothes the skin
Conditioning booster, nourishing agent
settings.description: Oil derived from pressed coconuts

settings.title: Sodium Bicarbonate
settings.description: Baking Soda!

settings.ewg_text: The Environmental Working Group’s mission is to empower people to live healthier lives in a healthier environment. With breakthrough research and education, we drive consumer choice and civic action.LEARN MORE

settings.title: Cetearyl Alcohol
settings.description: An alcohol derived from natural fatty acid from coconuts

settings.title: Citric Acid
settings.function: Maintains pH and boosts our preservative system
settings.description: An organic acid naturally occurring in citrus fruits

settings.title: Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil
settings.description: Essential oil derived from the peel of an orange

settings.title: Citrus Aurantifolia (Lime) Fruit Extract
settings.description: Conditions and provides aromatics for hair

settings.title: Citrus Reticulata (Tangerine) Peel Oil
settings.description: Essential oil derived from tangerine

settings.title: Cocamidopropyl Hydroxysultaine
settings.description: A coconut oil derived surfactant

settings.title: Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Fruit Extract
settings.description: The extract of the fruit of the coconut tree

settings.title: Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Fruit Juice
settings.description: The extract of the fruit of the coconut tree

settings.title: Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Water
settings.description: The extract of the fruit of the coconut tree

settings.title: Ethyl Alcohol
settings.description: Clear colorless liquid that serves as a hand sanitizer

settings.title: Eucalyptus Globulus (Eucalyptus) Leaf Oil
settings.description: Essential oil derived from eucalyptus leaf

settings.title: Glycerin
settings.description: A colorless, odorless, emollient that is sweet-tasting and non-toxic.

settings.title: Glycine Soja Oil
settings.function: Considered safe topically (not to ingest though) and helps protect moisture in skin and hair
settings.description: Protects and smoothes hair, Oil derived from the soybean plant

settings.title: Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Wax
settings.description: Wax derived from sunflower seeds

settings.title: Hibiscus Sabdariffa Flower Extract
settings.function: Promotes healthy hair growth and retains moisture in hair strands
settings.description: Extract of Hibiscus Flower

settings.title: Hydrogenated Vegetable Oil
settings.description: Oil derived from the soybean plant

settings.title: Hydrolyzed Keratin
settings.function: Smooths hair, reduces frizz, and promotes gloss
settings.description: A sheep-wool derived protein

settings.title: Hydrolyzed Quinoa
settings.function: Repairs hair damage, aids hair growth
settings.description: A quinoa grain extract that is broken down with water

settings.description: A compound found in arctic cloudberries, full of antioxidants

settings.description: Jojoba Oil that is broken down with water

settings.description: White clay derived from minerals

settings.title: Keratin Amino Acids
settings.description: An amino acid crucial to our hair care formula

settings.title: Lactobacillus / Tomato Fruit Ferment Extract
settings.description: A natural probiotic

settings.title: Lauryl Glucoside
settings.description: A bacteria that acts as a probiotic for your hair and is common in fermented foods like yogurt

settings.description: A floral oil derived from Lavender

settings.description: An organic aromatic water extracted from steaming lavender flowers

settings.title: Lavender (Lavandula Angustifolia) Distillate

settings.description: Derived from radishes

settings.description: Oil extracted from citrus fruit

settings.title: Linalool
settings.description: Found in the sweet orange essential oil

settings.description: Extract derived from the pulp found in the fruit of the palm tree

settings.description: Extract derived from the kernel of the palm tree

settings.description: A rich creamy oil obtained from cold pressed avocado

settings.description: Potassium soap derived from palm oil

settings.description: Jojoba Oil that is broken down with water

settings.description: Derived from palm oil
